batteryMaintenance.batteryMaintenance1: Your task will be beacon maintenance. Please go to the location of beacon number X as seen on the map. Once there you will find a beacon take it down and open it as described with the images below.
batteryMaintenance.batteryMaintenance2: Measure the voltage of the battery by placing the battery in between the multimeter's probes. As shown in the image below. If the battery level is less than 2.8 volts or no battery is found place a new battery as shown in the image below.
batteryMaintenance.batteryMaintenance3: If no beacon is found send “MISSING”.
